summary: An ordinance relating to buildings and other structures, regulating the design, construction, erection, shoring, underpinning, enlargement, alteration, repair, moving, removal, demolition, maintenance, use, occupancy, light, ventilation and sanitation thereof and the support of ground adjacent to fills and excavations, providing penalties and repealing Ordinance No. 31578 and all ordinances and parts thereof in conflict herewith.
